task_specification.title: Detect invalid phase state transitions
task_specification.description:
Implement detection for invalid phase state combinations:
1. invalid_outcome: Phase EXECUTED without outcome field
2. invalid_skip: Phase SKIPPED without blocked_by reason

Failure Modes:
- Phase claims completion but provides no evidence
- Phase marked SKIPPED with no explanation

Recovery Suggestions Generated:
1. WHY: State transitions require supporting data
2. HOW: Add required fields (outcome, blocked_by)
3. Actionable: Specific field to add and expected value format
acceptance_criteria: Includes expected field format in suggestions

phase_1_prepare.description: Remove @skip from target acceptance test scenario

phase_2_red_acceptance.description: Run acceptance test - MUST fail for valid reason

phase_3_red_unit.description: Write unit test that fails for CORRECT reason

phase_4_green_unit.description: Implement MINIMAL code to pass unit test

phase_5_check.description: Check if acceptance test passes now
